title: Macbook a2159  bord 820-01598
message:
hi i have macbook a2159 touchbar and kay boord not working 
no liquid , can you hal me pleas

title: Macbook a2159  bord 820-01598
message:
No liquid, but there should be some history fault.

Trackpad works correctly?
Check 3V3 and 5V power rails of J6700.

title: Macbook a2159  bord 820-01598
message: 3V3 and 5V power rails of J6700 is ok. trackpad not work 0

title: Macbook a2159  bord 820-01598
message:
Try known good trackpad board/flex.
Be sure R/L6700 are both good.

title: Macbook a2159  bord 820-01598
message: 12v arriva nella r6700, ma nella j6701 12v non arriva dalla r6700

title: Macbook a2159  bord 820-01598
message: 12v arrives in the r6700, but in the j6701 12v does not arrive from the r6700

title: Macbook a2159  bord 820-01598
message:
So R6700 is bad; replace it.
First be sure, no short to ground on its pin 2; check w/ and w/o TP connected.

title: Macbook a2159  bord 820-01598
message: now i have 12v on j6701 but it doesn't work again! CAN IT DEPEND ON THE u7800?

title: Macbook a2159  bord 820-01598
message:
Trackpad works good now?
Both touchbar and keyboard not working?

title: Macbook a2159  bord 820-01598
message:
There should be a reason R6700 got burnt.
Try known good trackpad board/flex.

title: Macbook a2159  bord 820-01598
message: ma se scollego il trackpad la tastiera deve funzionare

title: Macbook a2159  bord 820-01598
message: but if I unplug the trackpad the keyboard must work

title: Macbook a2159  bord 820-01598
message: but if I unplug the trackpad the keyboard must work, but the keyboard doesn't work either

title: Macbook a2159  bord 820-01598
message:
STOP to make wrong assumptions!!!
Keyboard information goes to PCH through trackpad...
